statements: DELETE FROM lead_scoring WHERE lead_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM lead_scoring WHERE email = 'johndoe@example.com' OR phone_number = '+1234567890';
DELETE FROM leads WHERE id = 123 AND email = 'test@example.com';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type = 'Call';
DELETE FROM Lead WHERE lead_score > 80 AND lead_status = 'Qualified';
DELETE FROM deals WHERE prospect_id = 200 AND deal_amount > 5000;
